review: I love this, use it almost every day.
author: Lance

review: I use this alongside my FireStick and with the two of them, I have endless TV possibilities.The best thing about this is when you have friends over, everyone can cast a YouTube video to the screen.When I'm hanging out we all are able to add videos to the playlist and everyone gets to hear what they want.How can you argue with that?? As long as you have a good internet connection, you're good to go!
author: Jordon Fiske

review: Xzibit asked me if I like to stream TV on my TV, and I said, "Hecks Yeah!" He then got a premier LA custom car shop to bling out my 32" Insignia with flame decals, LED underlighting, a hydraulic lift kit and this bad boy, the Google Chromecast! Now I can watch my favorite YouTube cat videos or the latest season of Orange is the New Black on Netflix in glorious 720P on my tricked out screen, and I can control all the action from pretty much any phone or tablet. Thank you, Xzibit!
author: Nebsker "Nebraska Cyclist"

review: Good condition at a good price.
author: Ajay Gupta

review: doesn't always come in clear or loses signal - can be frustrating when in the middle of a good movie!
author: Wendy Rubin

review: Works great!! Speedy shipping. Good price.
author: Joni
